DOC.brief_summary: To study association Genetic Polymorphisms Lung Cancer Risk Tianjin Population .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility criterion : - nonsmoker - female - age 35 80 - type tumor history - frequency-matched case control gender age Outcome measure : - OR ( odds ratio ) - RR ( risk ratio ) - CI ( confidence interval ) - SAS software
DOC.criteria: Nonsmall cell lung cancer Age 35 80 year old Female Nonsmokers Frequencymatched age gender Previous medical history cancer Previous radiotherapy Previous chemotherapy
